metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7275 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The POP3-over-SSL implementation in getmail 4.0.0 through 4.44.0 does not verify X.509 certificates from SSL servers, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof POP3 servers and obtain sensitive information via a crafted certificate.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

getmail4 - 4.46.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: getmail4 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.46.0-1').
